name: Meltrozo Sisters Pit Stop
description:
Kart racings is exciting! but in the middle of the race things can get messy and when a car is broken two heroes make sure that everything runs smoothly.

Buy the needed parts from the conveyor and get them to the broken karts to get some cash. Be weary of the parts you buy, the same part can come at different prices but the driver will always pay you the same!

The player with the most money at the end of the game will win.

You can hear the engines revving already. Are you ready?

This game was made in 48h for the Global Gamejam 2020 by Chandalf, Jacobotrf and Filo.

Only the Windows Builds have been tested. If you find any problem running the game please make sure to let us know.
